name: Wall of Sound v.1
description:
You may not distribute or sell these samples as your own. You may use these samples in audio, or film production.

Audio Example

Package Includes: 7 Cymbals sampled in the following formats: .WAV Files Kontakt .NKI Instrument Files (For Kontakt 4+ FULL ONLY) Cymbals Sampled: 6" Zildjian Zil Bell 6" Sabian Alu Bell 14" Sabian AA Medium Hihats 16" Sabian AAX V Crash 18" Sabian AAX V Crash 18" Wuhan China 21" Sabian AAX Raw Dry Bell Ride Equipment Used: Interface: RME Fireface 800 Word Clock: Apogee Big Ben Microphones: Neumann KM184 (Overheads) Neumann U87 (Room) Preamps: Great River MP-2NV (Overheads) API 3124 (Room) Cables: Mogami 2534 Microphone Cable /w Neutrik Gold XLR Connectors Mixing Tips: Cymbals could benefit with a high pass around 300hz - 400hz, and some light compression to bring out more sustain. Other Information: The .WAV and .NKI files you receive come in stereo pre-panned and are unprocessed. If you want to use them in mono, you will have to use a mono out routed in Kontakt or print/bounce them in mono through your DAW.
